comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content:
From the Wikipedia article for Ahmet: 
"Ahmet Ertegun (Turkish: Ahmet Ertegün; July 31 [O.S. July 18] 1923– December 14, 2006) was the Turkish American founder and president of Atlantic Records, writer of classic blues songs, and chairman of the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame and museum, described as "one of the most significant figures in the modern recording industry." He also co-founded the New York Cosmos soccer team of the North American Soccer League."
